title: Biome
definition: Classification by Olson et al. (2001) of the earth into fourteen units that host similar formations of plants and animals due to their climates. A single biome can be found over a range of continents.

title: EcoRegion
definition: Classification by Olson et al. (2001) of the earth into zones (ecoregions) encompassing distinct biotas. Ecoregions are nested within Biomes.
